topic.title: Implement Client-Side Save Action Using JavaScript Code

body.p:
It is possible to override the default save functionality of the Web Author editor by implementing a custom client-side Save action using JavaScript code:
Call editor.getContent() to obtain the content of the editor as a string.
You may need to mark the editor as saved.
Create a custom action and register it in the ActionManager with the ID "Author/Save".

ul.li: Autosave will not be affected by this customization. You can disable it by using the autoSaveInterval=0 loading option.
When uploading an image or creating a file from a template, this customization will not be used.
The save listeners will not be called with this approach.
